several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press. book details the behind-the-scenes stories of Michael Vick 's surviving dogs and the influence, resilience, dedication and commitment of the animal behavior experts, animal-care groups, lawyers and government officials that united to save them. I didn't interview Michael Vick for this book because to me the story was more about what happened afterwards, which was an amazing thing, says Gorant. "At the very core of the story is the human-animal bond that affects and inspires us all." Gorant will kick-off NASC's Annual Conference with the story of The Lost Dogs , on

WASHINGTON-- Indiana Dick Armey Mike Pence has to be flattered. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run for president. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, said state Dick Armey Kris Crawford. "We would like him on the ballot." Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter sent to Mike Pence this week.

Our goal was to reduce to a Base Force level with a cut of 500,000 active duty and an overall reduction of 25 percent of the budget, Colin Powell said in an email.
